title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 17 October 2013 - XWiki
content:

10:34 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
10:35 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
10:39 <Denis> has quit  
10:40 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
10:41 <gdelhumeau> can I close http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-9158 since we have a better "upgrade all wikis" now?  
10:42 <Denis> does it solve it ?  
10:42 <tmortagne> gdelhumeau: XWIKI-9158 is not about upgrade  
10:43 <gdelhumeau> DW does not need to be kicked  
10:43 <gdelhumeau> the subwiki has been upgraded  
10:43 <tmortagne> the issue is about a wiki that does not exist yet when DW run  
10:43 <gdelhumeau> ok, sorry  
10:44 <gdelhumeau> I just look at it more closely  
10:44 <tmortagne> Denis describe a use case were you create a new empty wiki and want to initialize it with the DW  
10:45 <tmortagne> don't hesitate to modify the descrition or the title in something you find more clear, you are probably not the only one  
10:57 <sdumitriu> has quit  
11:01 <andrewmcveigh|w> has joined #xwiki

11:06 <andrewmcveigh|wo> has joined #xwiki  
11:06 <sburjan> has quit  
11:18 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
11:19 <polx> has quit  
11:23 <gdelhumeau> platform build is broken  
11:24 <tmortagne> gdelhumeau: looks like a flickering, restarted it  
11:25 <tmortagne> xwiki-platform\_Quality seems to build fine  
11:25 <tmortagne> packager test are not our most stables tests...  
11:26 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
11:26 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
11:27 <polx> has quit  
11:31 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
11:33 <polx> has quit  
11:39 <gdelhumeau> I can't build entreprise  
11:39 <gdelhumeau> [INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------  
11:39 <gdelhumeau> [ERROR] Failed to execute goal org.xwiki.platform:xwiki-platform-tool-packager-plugin:5.3-SNAPSHOT:import (default) on project xwiki-enterprise-data-hsqldb: Failed to import XAR dependencies: Error number 3201 in 3: Exception while saving document xwiki:XWiki.TagClass: Error number 7002 in 7: Field sheet in object XWiki.TagClass has an invalid name -> [Help 1]  
11:41 <tmortagne> do you have a stack trace ?  
11:44 <tmortagne> you can get one with -e usually  
11:47 <tmortagne> packager test failed again, built well for me, will try with -U  
11:47 <gdelhumeau> Caused by: com.xpn.xwiki.XWikiException: Error number 7002 in 7: Field sheet in object XWiki.TagClass has an invalid name  
11:47 <gdelhumeau> ... 33 more  
11:49 <tmortagne> I may have an idea  
11:49 <tmortagne> checking something  
11:53 <tmortagne> should be better now  
11:56 <gdelhumeau> thx  
12:00 <gdelhumeau> great, it fixes my issue ;)  
12:01 <tmortagne> probably what made packager plugin fail, not sure why the quality build does not have the issue too  
12:09 <gdelhumeau> I try to fix a functionnal test  
12:09 <gdelhumeau> When I do the same steps that it, I don't have errors  
12:09 <gdelhumeau> So, the test fails but I can not reproduce :/  
12:11 <gdelhumeau> but in the functionnal test, we don't send the crsf token
